Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media

Class MediumController

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.media.MediumController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/rest/media/")
public class MediumController
extends java.lang.Object
Medium Controller

This Controller provides basic REST Interfaces to interact with Medium entities from the database

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

  • Method Details

    • getAllByCollection

      @GetMapping(path="/collection/{collectionId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<MediumDto>> getAllByCollection​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long collectionId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="asc") java.lang.String order)
      This Method is used to list all media that belongs to a given Collection
      Parameters:
      collectionId - the id of the collection
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      Returns:
      a list of found GameDTOs

    • getOne

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MediumDto> getOne​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws MediumNotFoundException
      This method is used to return a single medium
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the medium that should be returned
      Returns:
      the found medium
      Throws:
      MediumNotFoundException - if no medium was found
